lines.text: Swallow your horror and let it nourish you. Come with me and sing the song of misery. Share my world!
Death is a return, you know. We leave life just like we came in.
Naked, blind, and covered in our own shit.
I believe in the myth. But the fact, the flesh and blood, no. I'm afraid not.
I am the writing on the wall, the whisper in the classroom.
You're next, Purcell! Groin to gullet!
He lives in the mirror. That's how he gets you.
Break the mirror, break the curse.
